AxMacroDictionary.Name: MCRSalesLineSelect
AxMacroDictionary.Source: // Exclude sales line headers #localmacro.MCRSalesLineExcludeHeader %1.MCRLineType != MCRLineType::ContinuityParent && %1.LineDeliveryType != LineDeliveryType::OrderLineWithMultipleDeliveries && %1.MCRKitType != MCRSalesKitType::KitHeader #endmacro
